title: Survey | More Than Half of Teens Unprepared to Finance Their Futures - businessjournaldaily.com
content: Survey | More Than Half of Teens Unprepared to Finance Their Futures  businessjournaldaily.com
description: GIRARD, Ohio — More than half of high school teenagers are worried about their financial futures, according to a new survey published by Junior Achievement and Citizens Financial Group Inc. In the fifth annual JA Teens & Personal Finance Survey,…
